text:
Rim Banna (Arabic: ريم بنا‎; 8 December 1966 – 24 March 2018), was a Palestinian singer, composer, arranger and activist. He was most known for her traditional Palestinian songs and poetry. Banna was born in Nazareth. She was known for her 2005 album "The Mirrors of My Soul".
Banna died in Nazareth on 24 March 2018 from breast cancer at the age of 51.
